translation.en: How old was she?
Seventy-seven.
Seventy-seven.

[woman 1] The conference room's right this way.
[woman 2] Detectives, Braun, Baldwin, welcome.
I'm Linda Garran, risk manager.
This is Duncan Beattie, attorney. Our board.

Okay, well, we don't know much.
Just that there's been a death.

translation.en: An unexplainable incident in which the patient expired.
translation.it: Un incidente inspiegabile in cui la paziente è deceduta.

translation.en: Okay. Unexplainable how?
Well, it's the opinion of the medical experts
that this was an unusual adverse reaction to medications.
translation.it: si è trattato di un'insolita reazione avversa ai farmaci.

translation.en: But we found absolutely nothing to suggest this was intentional.
translation.it: Ma niente suggerisce che sia stato intenzionale.

translation.en: Then why call us?
We didn't think this was a police matter, but the Department of Health dictates when we should reach out,
translation.it: Non volevamo coinvolgere la polizia, ma il Ministero della Salute ce lo impone.

translation.en: and here we are.
What are the medications?
Um… Well, all are listed.
[Baldwin] Thanks.
It's quite a complicated document.
I'll take my chances.
Well, if you… if you turn to the third page,
you can see the window in which patient 1 had abnormal laboratory results
translation.it: è segnato il periodo in cui la paziente 1 ha mostrato valori anomali

translation.en: and life-threatening symptoms.
Where's Mrs. Martinez's body?

translation.en: Uh, released to the family.
They put a lawsuit together?
We don't believe that the family are aware

translation.en: of the unusual circumstances around patient 1's expiration.
translation.it: delle circostanze insolite riguardanti la morte della paziente 1.

translation.en: Isn't that something you should've disclosed to them?
It was an evolving situation.
translation.it: La situazione non era ben definita.

translation.en: Parkfield rightly sought legal counsel to make sure everything was done correctly.

translation.en: Okay, but Mrs. Martinez's body is where? How do we get it?

translation.en: When did she die?
Seven weeks ago.
We were conducting an internal investigation.
Hence the lag.
Okay.
Well, of course we'll need to interview all the staff that works in the ICU.

translation.en: Make way, make way. I am an important person of the town.

translation.en: [Charlie and Maya] "Wherever that is!"
I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls. "So, what do you do?"

translation.en: Okay. [chuckles]
"Well, you have to do something now."
"This may be just a one-horse town without the horse,
translation.it: Sarà anche una città piccola e insignificante,

translation.en: but it's been invaded by aliens."
translation.it: ma è stata invasa dagli alieni."

translation.en: One. You get to wear a fancy chain.

translation.en: Three…
You eat. It's…
"Three. You eat and drink for fr--" [grunts]
-I'm never gonna get this part! -Don't get frustrated, honey.

translation.en: Are you kidding? This is great, Alex.
No, and the teacher said that I should wear a suit and have a mustache.

I told him that, but--
It's a play about an alien invasion, and the female mayor's the weird part?

-[Jackie] I'm here! -[Amy] Hey!
-[Maya] Jackie! -No! You can't go yet.

Repeat after me.
I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls. I am the mayor of Humdrum Falls.

translation.en: [Braun] Cream and two sugars.
They send over that internal investigation yet?
Oh, not yet. They say they need more time to compile all the relevant files.
translation.it: Non ancora. Dicono che gli serve più tempo per mettere insieme i fascicoli.

translation.en: Seven weeks wasn't enough of a head start? You'd think.
translation.it: - Sette settimane non sono bastate? - Avrebbero dovuto.

translation.en: You want me to
go through the staff?
Already did.
One of the nurses had a criminal trespass charge over in Pennsylvania.
translation.it: Un'accusa di violazione di domicilio in Pennsylvania per un infermiere.

translation.en: Oh yeah? A nurse?
Yeah, a male nurse. Charles Cullen. C-U-L-L-E-N.
translation.it: Sì, un infermiere uomo. Charles Cullen. C-U-L-L-E-N.

translation.en: Huh. When?
Uh, eight years ago.
-What district was it in Pennsylvania? -Palmer.
translation.it: - In quale distretto della Pennsylvania? - Palmer.

translation.en: -Palmer Police Department. -Hello, ma'am.
I'm Detective Braun with Homicide in the Prosecutor's Office in New Jersey.
translation.it: Sono il detective Braun della Omicidi della procura del New Jersey.

translation.en: I need some background on a guy you picked up there in '95.
translation.it: Mi servono informazioni su un arresto del '95.

translation.en: Could you pull the case jacket for me?
-Do you have a name for me? -It's Charles Cullen.
-Oh, there's a Post-it note on the file. -There's a Post-it note on the file.
translation.it: - C'è un post-it sul fascicolo. - C'è un post-it sul fascicolo.

translation.en: She's not sure if it's supposed to be there. Can you spell that?
translation.it: Non è sicura che debba stare lì. Cosa dice?

translation.en: It says "digoxin."
Digoxin? What is that? A medicine or something?
translation.it: Digossina? Cos'è? Una specie di farmaco?

translation.en: Uh, you got anything else on him?
translation.it: Ha altro su di lui? Violazione di domicilio e…

translation.en: Picked up for trespassing and…
Okay. Picked up for trespassing and harassment in '95.
translation.it: Ok. Arrestato per violazione di domicilio e molestie nel '95.

translation.en: Says he slashed a coworker's tires after they broke up.
translation.it: Ha tagliato le gomme a una collega dopo che si erano lasciati.

translation.en: The charges were dropped. -What's that? -Yep, all charges.
translation.it: - Le accuse sono state ritirate. - Come?

translation.en: Charges were dropped? -Yeah. -Oh.
translation.it: - Le accuse sono state ritirate? - Sì, tutte. Esatto.

translation.en: Okay, thanks so much.
-Yep. -Bye-bye.
Something's not right.
Parkfield waited almost two months to report it.
translation.it: L'ospedale aspetta quasi due mesi per la denuncia.

translation.en: Internal investigation you don't wanna share.
Expensive lawyers.
Okay.
Well…
What possible reason could they have for covering up a death?
translation.it: Quale motivo avrebbero di insabbiare il caso?

translation.en: Right? What are the motives?
It's a business. There's never a better motivation than money
translation.it: Sono solo affari. In queste cose, i soldi sono sempre il movente migliore.

translation.en: when it comes to that shit, right?
translation.it: In queste cose, i soldi sono sempre il movente migliore.

translation.en: Hello? You can keep eating.
translation.it: Mi sentite? Continuate pure a mangiare.

translation.en: We won't take up too much of your time.
We just wanna make you aware of an event the hospital is looking into.
translation.it: Vogliamo solo informarvi di un caso su cui sta indagando l'ospedale.

translation.en: We wanted to assure you all that the board and I
translation.it: Vi assicuro che, insieme al consiglio,

translation.en: are dealing with the incident and everything connected to it.
translation.it: mi sto occupando di tutto ciò che lo riguarda.

translation.en: But we thought it best to bring you all together,
translation.it: Ma abbiamo deciso di riunirvi tutti qui

translation.en: make everyone universally aware that the police are also involved.
translation.it: per informarvi che è stata coinvolta anche la polizia.

translation.en: -And that-- -What is this about?
Uh, there's been an issue with a patient's death in the ICU.
translation.it: Si tratta della morte di una paziente in terapia intensiva.

translation.en: Was the death suspicious? I mean, if the police are investigating…
translation.it: La morte è sospetta? Voglio dire, se è coinvolta la polizia…

translation.en: I wanna be clear. We are investigating with the assistance of the local police.
translation.it: Sarò chiara. Stiamo indagando noi con l'aiuto della polizia.

translation.en: -Do you know which patient? -No.
translation.it: - Sai di che paziente parla? - No.

translation.en: [Garran] But due to the fact that outside investigation is involved,
translation.it: Ma, dato che ci sarà un'indagine esterna,

translation.en: uh, Mr. Beattie, our attorney, is here, and he would like to say something as well.
translation.it: il sig. Beattie, il nostro avvocato, è qui e vorrebbe rivolgersi a voi.

translation.en: Thanks.
Yes, uh, I just wanna say that I'll be discussing with each of you individually,
translation.it: Sì, vorrei solo dire che parlerò con ognuno di voi individualmente,

translation.en: but as a blanket statement to all,
translation.it: ma, come dichiarazione generale per tutti,

translation.en: I just wanna say that in times like this,
translation.it: aggiungo che, in momenti come questo,

translation.en: patient confidentiality has to be an absolute priority.
translation.it: il segreto professionale resta una priorità assoluta.

translation.en: Your individual contracts are very precise when it comes to this.
translation.it: I vostri contratti individuali sono chiari al riguardo.

translation.en: Anyone speaking to the police without a representative of the hospital present
translation.it: Chiunque parli con la polizia senza un rappresentante dell'ospedale

translation.en: would be in breach of their contract.
[clears throat] So at the end of the day, Mr. Beattie and I are here for you.
translation.it: Per concludere, io e il sig. Beattie siamo qui per voi.

translation.en: Uh, we wanna be present for any interviews, because we have your best interests at heart.

translation.en: You have full access, but she's gotta be in the room.
translation.it: Avrete pieno accesso, ma lei sarà presente.

translation.en: No. Absolutely not. She can't be in there.
translation.it: No. Assolutamente no. Non può essere presente.

translation.en: That lady's the risk manager. It's her job to be in there.

translation.en: Who's gonna talk if their boss is in the interview?
We don't even know what happened. We don't even have a body.
translation.it: Non sappiamo cosa sia successo. Non abbiamo il corpo.

translation.en: The only condition that they asked for is that she be in the room
translation.it: Hanno chiesto soltanto che lei sia presente

translation.en: and that you don't talk specific about medications.
translation.it: e che non parliate di farmaci.

translation.en: I understand them asking for it, but why did you give it to them?

translation.en: You're supposed to be the prosecutor.
As far as I can see, they're cooperating fully with your investigation.

translation.en: This is all we have. Is this cooperation? [prosecutor] They told me about that.
translation.it: - Questa la chiama collaborazione? - Me ne hanno parlato.

translation.en: They're getting the documents together. It's done. They're sending it first thing.

translation.en: [Baldwin] Let me ask.
Why would Parkfield conduct an internal investigation,

translation.en: a seven-week internal investigation,
then call us in and put her in the room if it was nothing?
translation.it: poi ci chiama e vuole la Garran presente, se non c'è niente sotto?

translation.en: Due diligence.
I'm shutting it down. She's in the room.
Done.
Hi, Amy.
Hi. [clears throat]
Nurse Loughren.
-This is Officer Braun, Baldwin. -How you doin'?

translation.en: -What is this about? -[Garran] Just some informal questions.

translation.en: The officers are speaking to a number of staff in the ICU.

translation.en: [Amy] Okay.
Do you remember Ana Martinez?
Yeah, Ana was my patient.
translation.it: Sì, Ana era una mia paziente.

translation.en: Do you recall anything odd about what happened to her?

translation.en: Odd?
[Braun] Well, she died.
Yeah, and it was very sad. It was sudden.

translation.en: Sudden?
Well, patients die in the ICU, but…

translation.en: we didn't expect it.
I don't mean to interrupt. Can I see you for a minute?

translation.en: Excuse me. I'll be right back.
This better be important. I wanted no interruptions.

translation.en: You see any deviations there?
Mm-mm.
Wait, yeah. Her glucose.
It's, uh…
Yeah, the blood sugars, it's wrong.
Uh, there's no C-peps.
-That's weird. -What does that mean?
Uh, it means that the insulin in her system wasn't made in her body.
translation.it: Che l'insulina presente non è stata prodotta dal suo corpo.

translation.en: Someone gave it to her.
So you can tell from that that she was given insulin?
translation.it: Da questo, capisce che le hanno dato l'insulina?

translation.en: Well, it's not on the list, and, you know, she's, uh… not diabetic,
translation.it: Beh, non è nell'elenco e lei non era diabetica,

translation.en: so the insulin would've been a double medication error,
translation.it: quindi le avrebbero dato per sbaglio due dosi,

translation.en: which is really rare, so…
A double medication error? It's rare?
translation.it: Due dosi per sbaglio? È raro?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Would that have killed her? -Sure.
[Garran] Sorry.
-[door closes] -[Garran] Where were we?
Uh, let's see. Oh.
Can you tell us anything about your coworkers?

translation.en: You don't mind if she answers a question about a colleague, do you, Ms. Garran?
translation.it: Può rispondere a una domanda su un collega, vero?

translation.en: -Of course not. -[Braun] Good
[Baldwin] We understand that you work with a Charlie Cullen.
translation.it: Sappiamo che lavora con Charlie Cullen.

translation.en: -[Amy] Yeah. -Could he be involved in this?
I think you're jumping to conclusions there, Officer.
Charlie wasn't there.
I mean, Ana died on the day shift. Charlie and I both work nights.
translation.it: Ana è morta di giorno. Io e Charlie lavoriamo di notte.

translation.en: We have no reasons to suspect it was anything other than an accident.
translation.it: Non abbiamo motivo di sospettare che non sia stato un incidente.

translation.en: Thank you, Amy.
I know Charlie really well.
We work every shift together, and he's a very good nurse.
translation.it: Lavoriamo insieme a ogni turno ed è un ottimo infermiere.

translation.en: He wouldn't have made a mistake like that. Thank you, Amy.
translation.it: - Non avrebbe commesso quell'errore. - Grazie, Amy.

translation.en: -So where's that internal investigation? -We're still reviewing everything.
translation.it: - Allora, l'indagine interna? - Stiamo ancora rivedendo tutto.

translation.en: Well, we don't need you to review it. We'll just take it as it is.
translation.it: Non ce n'è bisogno. Può darcela così com'è.

translation.en: I'll instruct the team to send you the boxes tomorrow.
translation.it: Dirò di mandarvi i documenti domani.

translation.en: But I hope you can deduce that, um… it's been a tough seven weeks.
translation.it: Ma spero possiate capire che sono state sette settimane difficili.

translation.en: Eight.
It's been eight weeks.
-[frantic beeping] -[doctor 1] Jack Ivins. July 19, '88.
Recovering from gallbladder surgery on Thursday. There was no complications.

translation.en: [woman] Line in. [doctor 2] Gonna need you to get ready to do another shock, 150 joules.

translation.en: -Everybody clear. -[doctor 3] Clear.
[doctor 2] Deliver the shock. Shock.
Resume compressions.
[doctor 4] One and two and three and four and five and six…

[doctor 2] Hold compressions. Let's check for a rhythm.
-[doctor 3] I got nothing. -[doctor 2] Persistent V-fib. Resume compressions.
translation.it: - Niente su questo lato. - Defibrilliamo. Compressioni.

translation.en: Let's get one milligram of epinephrine IV started.

translation.en: [doctor 3] Six, seven, eight, nine, ten…
[doctor 2] Let's get prepared to give it another shock, 200 joules.
[doctor 1] Epi ready. In line.
[doctor 2] Continue your breathing.
-[doctor 3] Twenty. -[doctor 1] Keep your compressions.
[doctor 3] Talk to me.
-[doctor 2] Is that epi ready? -[Amy groans]
Swap in, five, four, three, two…
translation.it: Cambio tra cinque, quattro, tre, due…

translation.en: -[gasping for breath] -[doctor 3] You're all clear.
-Oxygen's clear. -[defibrillation thumps]
[doctor 1] I'm moving in. Low pulse, low pulse.
-Shit, no pressure, still. -[continuous beep droning]
[doctor 2] Four and five and six and seven
translation.it: …quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto, nove, dieci,

translation.en: and eight and nine, ten, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15.
translation.it: …quattro, cinque, sei, sette, otto, nove, dieci, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15.

translation.en: Shit.
Twenty-five. Now! Now!
[doctor 2, muffled] Let's go!
Take these.
[softly] You'll get fired.
So there's a fault in the PYXIS.
So if you cancel a request late enough, it opens anyway.
translation.it: Se annulli una richiesta in ritardo, si apre comunque.

translation.en: That's stealing meds, Charlie.
Amy, stop. Now, please don't worry. I'm gonna help you get through this.
translation.it: Amy, smettila. Non preoccuparti. Ti aiuterò a superare questa cosa.

translation.en: Hey, what did he say?
[Charlie] I think he's right. I think you probably do need to tell Alex,
translation.it: Credo che abbia ragione. Credo che dovresti dirlo ad Alex.

translation.en: just in case something happens and I'm not there.
translation.it: Nel caso succeda qualcosa mentre non ci sono.

translation.en: They don't have anyone but me. I can't leave them.
translation.it: Hanno solo me. Non posso lasciarle.

translation.en: No, you're not leaving them, Amy.
That's not happening. It's… What is it? Two months?
translation.it: Non succederà. Quanto manca? Due mesi?

translation.en: Okay, so I'm gonna help you do this.
translation.it: Ti aiuterò io. Farai l'intervento e starai con le bambine.

translation.en: Get your surgery, be with your girls. That's what's happening.
translation.it: Ti aiuterò io. Farai l'intervento e starai con le bambine. Ecco come andrà.

translation.en: Okay?
But I think you should tell Alex.
[Amy] I know it sounds scary, but… it really isn't.

translation.en: -They're just these spaces. -Yeah.
They're two little spaces like balloons that fill with blood.
translation.it: Come due palloncini che si riempiono di sangue.

translation.en: -They move the blood around the body. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: - E lo mandano in tutto il corpo. - Sì.

translation.en: And um… mine, they just, you know,
they're too big, and they just got a little thin.
translation.it: Sono troppo grandi e sono diventati un po' troppo sottili.

translation.it: Ma starò bene. Ho le medicine.

translation.it: Ho dei medici che si prendono cura di me e presto starò di nuovo bene.

translation.en: If she were to fall or, um, you know, start speaking funny,
translation.it: Se dovesse cadere o iniziare a parlare in modo strano,

translation.en: or you struggle to wake her or something,
translation.it: o se tu facessi fatica a svegliarla o cose del genere,

translation.it: devi mettere Maya davanti alla TV, chiamare il 911 e poi me.

translation.en: Yeah, but that's not gonna happen. It's not gonna happen.
[softly] Everything's gonna be fine. I'm gonna be okay.

translation.en: Okay.
But I'll be here if you wanna…
[Braun] Charles Cullen with a C.
[man 1] Sure. Give me a second while I pull up his records.

translation.en: Great, thanks.
[man 1] Okay, I just need to check something with my boss.

translation.en: Okay. Sure.
[man 2] Hello?
Hello. Detective Braun here. Uh, who am I talking to?

translation.en: Mark Rossi. Attorney for St. Aloysius Hospital Group.
translation.it: Mark Rossi. Legale del St. Aloysius Hospital Group.

translation.en: Mr. Rossi, hi. I'm hoping you can help me out.
translation.it: Sig. Rossi, salve. Spero che possa aiutarmi.

translation.en: I'm looking for some information on one of your former employees

translation.en: from back in '96, Charles Cullen.
Our employee data is treated with strict confidentiality.
translation.it: I loro dati sono trattati con la massima riservatezza.

before it even goes out.

and because it enters the bloodstream slowly,

so that is the insulin taking effect.

and that's digoxin.

June '01 to August '03, maybe.
-Yes, that's what you wrote. -Right.

with immediate effect.

That's all.

-What? -So they're just gonna let him go?
